showerReviews.reviewText: Plenty of parking for professional drivers! Some of the best fuel prices around! Bathrooms & showers are clean! Store is decently clean & stocked pretty well! The evening shower attendant does a great job at making sure the showers are …

Cool place good food. But be carefull sending someone in for a shower. They apparently will decline showers if they think you dont look like a trucker. Had to go in with my buddy who had his mom and just wanted a shower. Your cashiers …

Very clean shower and shower attendant and cashier were very nice and helpful people. The shower water was too hot for me and it wouldn't turn any colder. I know most people are the opposite of me and would probably love it like that though …

… , we ended it with slice of chocolate cake and ice-cream, and a slice of cheesecake,  And the water pressure in the shower was great, except the floor was wet as there was no step up into the shower, and the cashier in morning was very …

If you want to take a shower, go somewhere else. The showers have no curtains, and everything gets soaking wet. Try getting dressed there afterwards. There are some showers that are designed to not have curtains, but not these. And if that …

Amazing staff!! The gentleman working front counter was so full of personality and was helpful when couldn't get app to work for team showers. The showers were spotless with lots of hot water and perfect amount of towels supplied. Leaving …

Terrible selection of water, and everything is overpriced. Shower had decent flow but the f ucking shower curtain rod fell on me. Not a very good truck stop in my opinion, totally in line with Petros standards though.

… Because I was sitting in the driver's lounge waiting on my wife to get out of the shower that I paid for and I am a CDL driver. They immediately started asking me to prove that I was a CDL driver and I had a right to be in their store. …

… machines with only 1 working and 8 dryers and 4 working. Over 2hour wait to take shower on Saturday morning only 2 ahead of me and over hour later no one has moved up. Public bathroom ran out of paper towels and convience store ran out …

… for the weekend. Definitely plenty of parking spots to start on a positive note. However, the shower smells like sewer gas, the coffee in the gas station area was burnt to hell, and the iron skillet took over an hour to get me my order.

locations.title: Four Star Fitness - Downtown
locations.content: Four Star Fitness - Downtown may offer shower facilities. Contact directly to confirm availability and pricing.

showerReviews.reviewText: Four Star has the best gyms in Oklahoma.  Clean facilities, excellent equipment, and a great staff.  Locally owned and operated too!  I was a member years ago and have recently come back, and it’s only gotten better.  Downtown is the …

I visited Four Star Fitness Downtown for a day pass and had a great experience! The gym has a solid range of equipment and a clean, welcoming atmosphere. Deaken at the front desk was super helpful, getting me set up quickly and answering all my questions with a friendly attitude. Overall, a smooth visit, definitely worth checking out!

Four star is awesome. It is super clean, has everything I could possibly need, and everyone there is super friendly. Deaken got us set up with our membership and made sure the gym fit our fitness goals. He was incredibly helpful! We are so happy with our membership!

Love this gym. The guy at the front desk, Deacon, kept a tight ship and was cleaning the whole time (something I like to see in a gym). The equipment is nicely organized and I experienced no issues. Deacon made the signup process very …

Great gym ! The space is well organized for maximum usage and not feeling cramped! Lots of unique equipment and everything was clean and well kept. Deaken at the front desk was very helpful showing me around the place and has great customer service skills. Very professional and informative !!

Great experience during the tour of the downtown gym, as well as a well-maintained clean gym every time I enter! Deaken was an amazing help and answered any question I may have! He is always welcoming when anyone walks in the door and is always helping members or keeping the place very clean!

locations.title: VASA Fitness
locations.content: VASA Fitness may offer shower facilities. Contact directly to confirm availability and pricing.

showerReviews.reviewText: The gym seemed decent, but the locker room needs some work and care. Half of the showers were out of order, including the single ADA compliant shower, which had no handle to turn on the water. The next one had no shower head. Then a broken …

The only thing I could complain about is maybe that the pool is only 4 feet deep, and the number of showers broken in the women's locker room is ridiculous especially the ONLY handicap shower, everything else is great. Hot tub sauna and …
… The guys locker room is nice. I've never had to wait for a shower stall. I'm assuming the women's locker room would be similar. …

The men's locker room needs air and ventilation. After I shower and get dressed, I'm dripping with sweat before I can get out of there. I hear others complaining about it as well.  Other than that, love this gym!
Overall is pretty good, but the shower and the bathroom is different story, especially the smell in the looker room, just nasty.
Vasa is a quality fitness center. The only thing i don't like is the shower area. It needs to be upgraded

showerReviews.reviewText: Sparkling clean, easy to get in and out for this chunky little Granny! Lifeguard on duty was a friendly young lady, picnic tables, lounge chairs...and my granddaughter loved the diving board! My new Summer hangout!
Great pool! Clean and pretty big. With smaller shallow pool for the little ones.
Awesome pool run by nice people.... It's always clean & i think it's a salt water pool because the water is nicer than other public pools
Never overly crowded, clean pool and area, nice people, and always life guard ready and on duty!!! And bathrooms and snack bar:)))
